Package com.im.njams.sdk.communication.kafka

Class SharedKafkaReceiver

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.im.njams.sdk.communication.AbstractReceiver
      • com.im.njams.sdk.communication.kafka.KafkaReceiver
        • com.im.njams.sdk.communication.kafka.SharedKafkaReceiver
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Receiver, ShareableReceiver<org.apache.kafka.clients.consumer.ConsumerRecord<?,​?>>
    public class SharedKafkaReceiver
extends KafkaReceiver
implements ShareableReceiver<org.apache.kafka.clients.consumer.ConsumerRecord<?,​?>>
    Overrides the common KafkaReceiver for supporting receiving messages for multiple Njams instances.
    Author:
    cwinkler
